verses.name: Acts 27:42
verses.text: And the soldiers’ counsel was to kill the prisoners, lest any of them should swim out, and escape.

verses.name: Acts 27:43
verses.text: But the centurion, willing to save Paul, kept them from their purpose; and commanded that they which could swim should cast themselves first into the sea, and get to land:

verses.name: Acts 27:44
verses.text: And the rest, some on boards, and some on broken pieces of the ship. And so it came to pass, that they escaped all safe to land.
